title: Part A

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for setup

2 point are earned for antiderivative

1 point is earned for evaluation

Volume=2π ∫ 0 1 x( x 2 x 2 +1 )  dx                     =2π ∫ 0 1 x − x x 2 +1   dx                     = 2π( x 2 2 − 1 2 ln|   x 2 +1  | )| 0 1                    =π( 1−ln2 )

or

Volume=π ∫ 0 1 2 x( 1− y 1−y )  dy                     = π( 2y+ln| y−1 | )| 0 1 2                    =π( 1−ln2 )
